snippet: The newspaper, Weekly Trust, said soldiers raided its work sites just days after it published an article that accused army generals of corruption.
abstract: Nigerian newspaper Weekly Trust claims that soldiers raided its work sites and blocked newspaper distribution just days after it published an article that accused army generals of corruption; army acknowledges that it had searched the newspaper's vehicles, but says that it was conducting a routine security action.
lead_paragraph: The newspaper, Weekly Trust, said soldiers raided its work sites just days after it published an article that accused army generals of corruption.

headline.main: Nigerian Newspaper Says Army Blocked Distribution
headline.print_headline: Nigerian Newspaper Says Army Blocked Distribution
